Articles.Content:
If anyone could write up a simple planet and some rearangement for Kopernicus that would be AWESOME. Here is the request:

• Basically, a clone of Jool, but bright pink. Same size, same texture, but pink.

• The planet orbits where Kerbin was.

• The folowing bodies orbit it from closer to furthest: Minmus -> Kerbin -> Mun 

 

Whoever is willing to do this can take full credit for it, and gets to name the planet whatever the hell they want! 

 

Thanks!

On 4-8-2016 at 8:52 PM, Shnezzberry said:

• The planet orbits where Kerbin was.

Whoever is willing to do this can take full credit for it, and gets to name the planet whatever the hell they want! 

 

Thanks!

I cant make a mod like that. But there is a Kopernicus mod called New Horizons, it makes Kerbin orbit a gas gaint (like you requested)
